NSE revises lot sizes for index derivatives effective Oct 28, 2025 (EOD)
Nifty 50: 7565 | Bank Nifty: 3530 | Finnifty: 6560 | Midcap Nifty: 140120
Stay informed. Trade smart. 
#NSE #Nifty #BankNifty #Finnifty #StockMarket #Derivatives #Trading #FinanceIndia.

#NSE has announced a revision in the lot size of F&O contracts of #Nifty, #BankNifty, #FinNifty & #MidcapNifty.

▪︎The lot size of Nifty has been revised from 75 to 65.
▪︎#Bank_Nifty : from 35 to 30.
▪︎Nifty Financial Services (#FinNifty): from 65 to 60.

Finally, some signs of growth getting back to #HDFCBank
